name: UNNER Run Surfers
description:
RUNNER Run Surfers game 

Run as fast as you can dodge the oncoming Obstacles 
Save your player , run in the Difference Paths, what are you waiting for? 

Endless RUNNER Run Surfers game , as you run soon, you will find, everything is speed up. No matter how, remember to jump all obstacles. Run as fast as you can, up to jump Use tapping on screen for Player Jump , experience the unique Levels.

challenge the highest score of the rank with the world players. if you are a good runner, this is the best place for you. the more score multiplier you are, the higher score you get.
The most excited themed runner game, escape from the Obstacles, run as fast as you can. Intuitive controls to run, jump obtain more coins !

Runner is an endless running game, to be the best runner, save the Player. More characters, such as Max, Mandy, choose your best liked runner.


★ Beautiful graphics
★ Free to play in google play
★ Gorgeous new organic Environments
★ New obstacles More than 10+
★ Avoid obstacles
★ Collect more and more coins
★ More Levels
★ Special powers for each character
★Impressive music
★Upgrade all the properties



RUNNER Run Surfers Tips:
1.Test your running skill
2.Intensive game rhythm: explore and face the unknown obstacles and fear
3.Impressive music - sound effects: race and compete with your friends 

Collect coin and many special item to increase speed while running.
